item.title: Install Kubernetes1.20.1 and Containerd1.4.3 on Ubuntu with ZFS
item.description: 基于ZFS的Ubuntu20.04安装kubernetes1.20 containerd 安装 containerd containerd.io 1.4.3 269548fa27e0089a8b8278fc4fc781d7f65a939b 安装 # 安装必要组件 $ sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-get install \ apt-transport-https \ ca-certificates \ curl \ gnupg-agent \ software-properties-common # 安装gpg key curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - # 验证gpg key $ sudo apt-key fingerprint 0EBFCD88 # 添加 repo $ sudo add-apt-repository \ "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu \ $(lsb_release -cs)\ stable" # 安装containerd $ sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-get install containerd.
